meanings.definition: An excessive and dangerous dose of a drug.
meanings.sent1: The hospital treated many patients for overdoses of medicine.
meanings.sent2: She ended up in the emergency room due to multiple overdoses.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character comically suffered from overdoses of candy.
meanings.sent4: His love for sweets was like an overdose, causing him to feel sick.
meanings.sent5: The warning label reminded users to avoid overdoses for safety.

meanings.definition: To take an excessive dose of a drug.
meanings.sent1: He accidentally overdoses on his medication sometimes.
meanings.sent2: She warned him not to overdose on the painkillers.
meanings.sent3: The movie character always seems to overdose on excitement.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for fashion can sometimes make her feel like she overdoses on shopping.
meanings.sent5: It's important to follow the instructions to avoid overdosing on medication.

meanings.definition: To administer an excessive dose of a drug.
meanings.sent1: The nurse must never overdose patients with medication.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are careful not to overdose their patients during treatment.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally overdosed the dish with salt.
meanings.sent4: The speaker overdosed the audience with too much information.
meanings.sent5: It's crucial for caregivers to avoid overdosing patients with medication.
